title: SMC_CamDisplayer_Dynamics (Struct)
text:
TYPE SMC_CamDisplayer_Dynamics : STRUCT
Data structure containing the cam dynamics at a master position.

rows.Name: v
rows.Comment: Slave velocity wrt. the master position

rows.Name: a
rows.Comment: Slave acceleration wrt. the master position

rows.Name: j
rows.Comment: Slave jerk wrt. the master position
